metadata.name: Ziggurat
metadata.description:
“Ziggurat” is a large holy structure built in ancient Mesopotamia, dating back to 1200 BC. Ziggurat is made by sub-baked bricks covered by fired bricks on the outside. 

This imaginary 3D version represents the peaceful gathering of the 193 UN member states.

This Persian Monument is an NFT project designed by oiïo|Mozhdeh & KIX. 
Its 3D file is available upon request to be used for any desirable Metaverse.  

Voxel Art, OctaneRender,
6000x6000 Pixel.
